body:
## User Story
As a **creator**, I want to **review and approve waitlist applications** so that **I can control who gets access**.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Can view pending waitlist entries
- [ ] Can see applicant answers to custom questions
- [ ] Can approve or reject applications one by one
- [ ] Approved users receive email with access instructions
- [ ] Can see history of approved/rejected applications

## Technical Requirements
- Create AccessPasses::WaitlistEntry model (namespaced)
- Add custom_questions JSONB field to AccessPass
- Add answers JSONB field to WaitlistEntry
- Create Account::WaitlistEntriesController for management
- Create Public::WaitlistEntriesController for applications
- Add email notifications on approval/rejection
- Add status enum: [:pending, :approved, :rejected]

## Super Scaffold Commands
```bash
# Create WaitlistEntry model
rails generate super_scaffold AccessPasses::WaitlistEntry AccessPass,Space,Team user:super_select{class_name=User} answers:text_area status:buttons approved_at:date_and_time_field

# Add custom_questions to AccessPass
rails generate super_scaffold:field AccessPass custom_questions:text_area
```

## Implementation Steps
1. Create WaitlistEntry model with proper associations
2. Add custom questions builder to AccessPass form
3. Create public application form
4. Build management interface for creators
5. Add email notifications
6. Create approval/rejection actions

## Dependencies
- Requires AccessPass model from Story 2
- ActionMailer for notifications

## Priority
Medium for Phase 1 MVP - enables exclusive access control
